ygData.subject: Recent adventures of Barto Proudfoot
ygData.msgSnippet: I am still hunting South Karana. Mostly solo Tesh Mas Gnolls and Aviaks that wander around the hermit s house. Once in a while I find an item through my
ygData.messageBody:
I am still hunting South Karana. Mostly solo Tesh Mas Gnolls and
Aviaks that wander around the hermit's house. Once in a while I find
an item through my research I can go for. Just got my Testament of
Vainer (sp?) and am considering the Qeynos badge series. Stats aren't
bad and doesn't look too time consuming.

I am spending time looking over various web sites to select new
prospective pieces of equipment to hunt for or do quests for.
Leveling a bit over time. So many fine pieces will have to wait. Yet
there are many good items I can aquire in my 30's.

The research is, for me, part of the game. A challenge, finding
something I can go for. I am most thankful for the many great sites I
can use in my research.

Barto Proudfoot
Halfling Druid
Zeb Server
